description: Microsoft has released emergency out-of-band (OOB) updates to fix a known issue causing Windows domain controllers to crash after installing the March 2024 Windows Server security updates. [...]
title: Microsoft releases emergency fix for Windows Server crashes

description: Researchers are warning that a notorious hacking group linked to Russia's Foreign Intelligence Service (SVR) is targeting political parties in Germany for the first time, shifting their focus away from the typical targeting of diplomatic missions. [...]
title: Russian hackers target German political parties with WineLoader malware

description: Mozilla has released security updates to fix two zero-day vulnerabilities in the Firefox web browser exploited during the Pwn2Own Vancouver 2024 hacking competition. [...]
title: Mozilla fixes two Firefox zero-day bugs exploited at Pwn2Own

description: The German police have seized infrastructure for the darknet Nemesis Market cybercrime marketplace in Germany and Lithuania, disrupting the site's operation. [...]
title: Darknet marketplace Nemesis Market seized by German police

description: A new side-channel attack called "GoFetch" impacts Apple M1, M2, and M3 processors and can be used to steal secret cryptographic keys from data in the CPU's cache. [...]
title: New GoFetch attack on Apple Silicon CPUs can steal crypto keys

description: Pwn2Own Vancouver 2024 has ended with security researchers collecting $1,132,500 after demoing 29 zero-days (and some bug collisions). [...]
title: Hackers earn $1,132,500 for 29 zero-days at Pwn2Own Vancouver
